title: Hextech Bug?
body:
I just finished playing a game with one of my friends, bot lane, as Rengar {{champion:107}}  and Kha'zix {{champion:121}} . The game went very well and was extremely fun. At the end of the game however, I didn't get a chest {{item:3070}}  My friend got an S+ on Kha'Zix, as he went 30/5, and we were duo in norm drafts. I did have a chest available. Wondering if this is a bug {{champion:121}} ?
Thank you!

replies.body: It looks like you've already received a chest for Rengar earlier this season.  You may only obtain one chest per champion per season.  Additionally, you need to own a champion in order to unlock a chest.  More information on that can be found through our [Hextech Crafting ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)guide.  Hope that helps!
That's even if a member of my party earned an S?
